alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai East; Koolau Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai Windward; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 09 at 3:56AM HST until February 11 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR EAST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI AND THE BIG ISLAND... .Large and rough conditions due to advisory level surf and strong easterly trade winds will continue through the weekend. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Surf of 8 to 12 feet building to 10 to 14 feet Friday. * WHERE...East facing shores of Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, Maui and the Big Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and powerful currents will lead to life threatening swimming conditions. Localized beach erosion with some overwash onto vulnerable coastal roadways possible, especially at and around high tide.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
